trend_summary: Across the sequence, the landscape remains mainly agricultural with scattered villages. The central quarry widens steadily, woodland shifts from slight gain to marked loss in the northeast, and field blocks are progressively consolidated. Only modest fringe growth of settlements occurs, keeping overall built-up presence low and rural character intact.
notable_changes: Central open-pit quarry elongates and broadens in every successive image.
Woodland cover rises slightly early on, then is markedly cleared in the eastern half by the last image.
Agricultural parcels merge into larger, more regular fields, indicating consolidation.
Minor outward growth of the main settlement surrounding the quarry.
Vegetation vigour fluctuates, suggesting crop rotation or changing irrigation patterns.
